item.title: Want to be part of a village? You might need to get out of your comfort zone
item.description: If you've always dreamed of having a village but feel disconnected from your community, try these five tips. Plus: We want to hear from you. Tell us h...

item.title: Medicare Advantage insurers face new curbs on overcharges in Trump plan
item.description: Federal officials have a plan that could curb billions of dollars in overpayments to Medicare Advantage plans. But will they follow through on it?

item.title: Why these women break the law to sell their eggs for IVF
item.description: Women in India were told they couldn't be paid for their eggs. The result: a black market for eggs from women in need of money to survive.

item.title: Caregivers for the elderly could lose wage protections under Trump proposal
item.description: The Labor Department has proposed rescinding an Obama-era rule that gave home care workers the right to overtime pay and other wage protections. The a...

item.title: U.S. life expectancy hits a new high as deaths from overdoses and COVID fall
item.description: An American born in 2024 can expect to live to be 79, on average. But people in other wealthy countries can expect to live longer.
